name: prism-mcp-server
description: PRISM Manufacturing Intelligence MCP Server - CNC machining data, calculations, and AI orchestration

scripts.build: node --max-old-space-size=8192 node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc --noEmit && node node_modules/esbuild/bin/esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; import { fileURLToPath } from 'url'; import { dirname } from 'path'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url); const __filename = fileURLToPath(import.meta.url); const __dirname = dirname(__filename);" --external:@modelcontextprotocol/sdk --external:zod --external:better-sqlite3 --external:cpu-features --external:ssh2 --external:playwright --external:bufferutil --external:utf-8-validate
scripts.build:fast: node node_modules/esbuild/bin/esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; import { fileURLToPath } from 'url'; import { dirname } from 'path'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url); const __filename = fileURLToPath(import.meta.url); const __dirname = dirname(__filename);" --external:@modelcontextprotocol/sdk --external:zod --external:better-sqlite3 --external:cpu-features --external:ssh2 --external:playwright --external:bufferutil --external:utf-8-validate
scripts.build:all: npm run build:fast && npm run build:web

author: PRISM Manufacturing Intelligence
